title: Ruby Robe
summaries: The Ruby Robe is an Armor item and part of the Wizard set, being wearable in the shirt slot. It is the third strongest Gem Robe, weaker than the Amber Robe and the Diamond Robe.

Wearing the <linked>Wizard Hat</linked> alongside the Ruby Robe provides a set bonus of +10% magic critical strike chance, while wearing a <linked>Magic Hat</linked> alongside it provides a set bonus of +60 <linked>Mana</linked>. Any leg-slot equipment can be worn with these set bonuses remaining intact.
